Reviews.Title: Bought this for my dad
Reviews.Author: leilani  Kesting
Reviews.Content: I had originally bought this for my dad, but he ended up not wanting it. Which is the reason why this only gets 4 stars. From what it seems, the phone was flawless, but it never actually got used so I can't say anything on how it functions. It seems like it would've been a completely flawless phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
multi-tasking without slowing performance
HD video recording and editing
Face Time - Video Calling, touchscreen
smartpone, front and rear view cameras
5-megapixel camera with LED flash
ProductInfo.Name: Apple Iphone 4 - 16gb Verizon (CDMA) Black, Smartphone, like new, in box with all the accessories, clean esn!!
